title: Ring of Fire - September 07 2013
description:
September 07, 2013
Ring of Fire 
Hosted by Robert F. Kennedy Jr., Mike Papantonio and Sam Seder

This week on Ring of Fire Radio: 


Hour 1: News stories the mainstream news ignored.


Hour 2: Journalist Ben Adler tells us why the Left is torn apart over whether or not to support action against Syria and Author Paul Waldman will talk to us about the use of chemical weapons abroad.


Hour 3: The Nation MagazineÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Washington Correspondent John Nichols will discuss the Constitutionality of a strike on Syria and Investigative journalist Gareth Porter will tell us how intelligence on Syria has been manipulated to support military action.
